title: EpicsaurusREX
author: EpicsaurusREX
created_time: November 21, 2022, 06:05:56 PMLast edit: November 21, 2022, 06:50:30 PM by EpicsaurusREX
content: I am happy to offer you my services of taking scanned documents and converting them to editable text files. I am also open to take payment in bitcoin, just dm me here  If you want to place an order go to https://www.fiverr.com/share/0NxelLI can do everything that e.g. adobe acrobat pro offers, but without you needing to get an expensive subscription  license 25 $ a month or 250$ per year. Most of the time you only need this type of gig one or two times per month, lets say you need two books converted to editable text 1000 pages, that is only 10 dollar for my service. I also deliver much quicker specially when doing lots of documents 1000 images at a time and so on. Best RegardsSweden_Pro

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: EpicsaurusREX on November 21, 2022, 06:05:56 PMI am happy to offer you my services of taking scanned documents and converting them to editable text files.If you want to place an order go to https://www.fiverr.com/share/0NxelLBest RegardsSweden_ProWhat can you do that I can't do with Acrobat Pro?

comments.author: EpicsaurusREX
comments.body: Plz see my main post for answer

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on November 21, 2022, 06:07:42 PMQuote from: EpicsaurusREX on November 21, 2022, 06:05:56 PMI am happy to offer you my services of taking scanned documents and converting them to editable text files.If you want to place an order go to https://www.fiverr.com/share/0NxelLBest RegardsSweden_ProWhat can you do that I can't do with Acrobat Pro?OP has already mentioned this.Quote from: EpicsaurusREX on November 21, 2022, 06:05:56 PMI can do everything that e.g. adobe acrobat pro offers, but without you needing to get an expensive subscription  license 25 $ a month or 250$ per year.Only those who will use his service are not willing to buy Adobe acrobat pro. That can be a good deal especially when you don't regularly need to convert the documents. Also, the OP is a level one seller at a fiverr and got some good reviews, 4.8 to be exact out of six reviews. I haven't tried his service but just check his profile at fiverr.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on November 21, 2022, 07:47:10 PMOP has already mentioned this.No really. He did not already mention it. He edited the text after I asked him the question:https://loyce.club/archive/posts/6132/61327770.htmlQuote from: noormcs5 on November 21, 2022, 07:47:10 PMAlso, the OP is a level one seller at a fiverr and got some good reviews, 4.8 to be exact out of six reviews. I haven't tried his service but just check his profile at fiverr.Well, I'm not going to do it because I have an Acrobat Pro license, but besides, you don't even need it nowadays. Google lens for example does the same for you, and I'm sure that if I start searching I'll find a few more apps that do the same for me.I suppose someone might find it useful, but it's not for me. Good luck.

comments.author: EpicsaurusREX
comments.body: It will be so fun to scan 1000 pages with google lens

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: EpicsaurusREX on November 22, 2022, 08:54:29 AMIt will be so fun to scan 1000 pages with google lens  If anyone wanted to scan 1000 pages,  means they need this service on a regular basis.So why would they buy this service from you? They may better buy the Adobe version of the software, Acrobat Pro, and that will be a better option for those who need this conversation often.
